observationText: Homozygous Nf1flox/flox mice were viable, fertile and did not show any gross or histological abnormalities.
The Nf1flox allele was susceptible to Cre-mediated recombination in vivo, and the recombined Nf1flox allele phenocopied the Nf1 null allele.

Nf1flox/flox mice bred with a transgenic strain expressing Cre recombinase in the germline resulted in progeny with a recombined Nf1 null allele that phenocopied the embryonic lethality and developmental defects seen in conventional Nf1 null mice.
